_sText:
Update 17-4-09: Version 1.2 - Removed the moving platform behind the roof doors. You could get stuck in it, then use !zstuck and get in a place where you couldn't get out. - Changed the door sounds. The old ones didn't sound very good. - Changed the speed of the elevators at the second floor, so that the zombies can catch up with the survivors a bit earlier. - Added some more obstacles in the final room to (hopefully) make it easier for survivors.
Update 11-4-09: Beta 3 -> Version 1 - Removed a bug that would stop the mine shaft elevators from moving when the button to activate those elevators was pressed too early. - Added a fence that has to be destroyed before players can enter the pool.
Update: 10-4-09 - Changed the end of the map - Fixed some bugs - Added more console messages - Added a couple more details
This is the second zombie escape map I created. The first one was pretty bad, so when I got this new idea I decided to work it out. You have to escape from a (jail) complex by making your way up to the final control room, where you can acces the computer to release a nerve gas. This is the Beta version. I hope that you will post some constructive feedback (if you have any), so I can improve the map and upload a final version if necessary.
